conbody.p: Notices may be un usual text to indicated special remarks about the text to follow.
In standardization documents, very often we find patent warnings in notices.

The notices section is build as usual concept type. However, the DITA-OT catches the notices type incommons.xsl and provides separate attributes. By default these attributes derive from some defaults by they are addressable separately.
The keyword to understand the notices processing is processTopicNotices. This template is called out of the topic/topic (very general) processing step and explicitly processed in commons.xsl.

section.title: Sub-Notices
section.p: The Notices may contain subchapters which will be correctly listed in the mini-toc. As of today the mini-toc only puts out H2 chapters, in general that should be ok but I will still have to fix that.
This block is created as a section.
